name: YumNum's Adventure
description:
Disclaimer: 

This is the first public version of this unfinished game so it's still missing a large amount of it's planned content. Expect there to be bugs and to lack polish in some places.

Synopsis:

Yum and Num are best friends living peaceful lives out in the country until one day when tragedy strikes in the form of their empty fridge freezer. With dinner fast approaching Yum and Num must go on an epic quest to save their meal. They must go to the grocery store!

Use the power of Yum's elongated tongue to and Num's guiding instructions run, jump and swing your way to the grocery store. What perils will our hero's face? Will their friendship withstand the pressure of there quest? Will they reach the grocery store? Only you can help them on their quest.

Current Features:

  • Physics-based grappling hook
  • Physics-based 2D platforming 
  • 1 world with 16 levels
  • Accessibility options

Planned Features:

  • 2 additional worlds
  • World gimmicks
  • Optional collectable food around the levels for extra challenge
  • Better Audio
  • Speed run timer
  • Level select
  • Saving
  • Grocery Stores

In development:

This game is in development so expect things to change slightly down the line. Any and all feedback is welcome so please try to be constructive. 

Bugs:

Please report any bugs to this form here.

Credits:

LittleTech:    Background art and hand drawn Yum. (Literally dose not

exist on the Internet)

Jorge:              Everything else.  (Portfolio Link)

Have fun!
